ref.mixed-citation: See Yingyai shenglan [瀛涯勝蘭], by Ma Huan 馬歡 ( ca. 1380–1460), Mills J. V. G., ed., Ying-yai sheng-lan [瀛涯勝蘭]: The Overall Survey of the Ocean's Shores, transl. from the Chinese text by Feng Ch’eng-chün, with introduction, notes and appendices by J. V. G. Mills. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press for the Hakluyt Society. 1970; and Fei Xin 費信. Hsing-ch’a sheng-lan 星槎勝覽 – The Overall Survey of the Star Raft, transl. by J. V. G. Mills, ed. by Ptak R. Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz Verlag. 1996. For the Chinese texts, see https://ctext.org/wiki.pl?if=gb&chapter=566144 and https://ctext.org/wiki.pl?if=gb&res=99548.
